name: eRS-FetchWorklist-Operation-1
description: Request to retrieve a worklist for a referral request.

parameter.name: listType
parameter.documentation: Indicates the type of list requested, this is currently fixed to 'REFERRALS_FOR_REVIEW'.

parameter.name: specialtyAssignedIndicator
parameter.documentation: Indicates whether a Specialty is assigned to the Referral Request. If 'Assigned' the 'Specialty' parameter must be present. If 'Not Assigned' the 'specialtyAssignedIndicator' and 'Specialty' parameter must be absent.

parameter.name: specialty
parameter.documentation: The Specialty for the service. If present, the 'specialtyAssignedIndicator' parameter must be set to 'Assigned'. The specialty list must be retrieved dynamically from the e-RS valueset.

parameter.name: clinicianAssignedIndicator
parameter.documentation: Indicates whether a clinician is assigned to the Referral Request. If 'Assigned' the 'Clinician' parameter must be present. If 'Not Assigned' the 'Clinician' parameter must be absent.

parameter.name: clinician
parameter.documentation: The clinician assigned to the Referral Request. If present, the 'ClinicianAssignedIndicator' parameter must be set to 'Assigned'

parameter.name: response
parameter.documentation: The List resource that has been returned in response to the given input parameters
